title: Ground Plus ist Floor Luxury House For Sale In Woodlands Avenue
details:
This is $ Bed Room Luxury House with attached bath Roms.i in Woodlands Avenue Off Anderson road in Kohuwela. The ground floor has a Guest Room with attached Bath Room.This has Living,Dining,Laundry Kitchen.Maid Room,and Wet Kitchen., with Store area..
The 1st Foor has 3 Bed Rooms with attached Bath Rooms ,Dining,Living.TV areas..This has a Balcony and the house is fully Air Conditioned ,with Solar Power,the house a Pressure Pump and 5000 litres Water Tank in the Roof top.
